message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient’s symptoms suggest panic disorder, and paroxetine, a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor, is the best pharmacological treatment for long-term management of this disorder. Benzodiazepine can be used for acute panic attacks but is not recommended for long-term use. Phenelzine and nortriptyline are used for depression and anxiety disorders, but paroxetine is better suited for panic disorder.
